item.title: My LeetCode Diary - Day1 Arrays
item.description: Day1 Arrays - My LeetCode Diary int[] myNum = {10, 20, 30, 40}; //Loop Through an Array for (int i = 0; i < myNum.length; i++) { System.out.println(myNum[i]); } //OR for (int i : myNum) { System.out.println(i); } int[][] myNumbers = { {1, 2, 3, 4}, {5, 6, 7} }; System.out.println(myNumbers[1][2]); // Outputs 7 //Loop Through Multi-Dimensional Arrays for (int i = 0; i < myNumbers.length; ++i) { for(int j = 0; j < myNumbers[i].
